articles.author: Mike Stobbe
articles.title: More than 120,000 US kids had caregivers die during pandemic - Associated Press
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — The number of U.S. children orphaned during the COVID-19 pandemic may be larger than previously estimated, and the toll has been far greater among Black and Hispanic Americans, a new study suggests.
